greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest prime p associated with A064164(n).
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..120
example: 8!+1 = 61*661 and 61 is not 1 mod 8, so the first term is 61.
program: lista(nn) = for(k=1, nn, if(choose(k)>1, print1(choose(k), ", "))); \\ _Jinyuan Wang_, Oct 03 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 23 2001
